article: Young people often say that their parents don't understand them.They often think that their parents are out of _ ways;that they are too serious and too _ with their children;that They _ give their children free space. For example,young people like to act on the spot without much _ .It is one of their ways to show that they have grown up and they can _ any difficult situation.Older people _ more easily.Most of them plan things _ ,at least in the back of their minds,and do not like their plans to be upset by something _ .
